error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. Anie needs 5 extra hours, not 10.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 75
Every day, in addition to her 10-hour work schedule, Anie needs 10 extra hours, which means she works 10+10= <<10+10=20>>20 hours each day.
If the project is estimated to take 1500 hours, Anie will need to work for 1500/20 = <<1500/20=75>>75 days to complete the project.
